short.en: An AI-based input method for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: AI-IME 是一个借助 AI 实现输入自由的 Chrome 插件。点击后，会弹出网页，用户可以用任何英文加拼音随意输入，AI 会进行更智能的拼写和语法识别，帮助中文等其他语言使用者摆脱输入法的束缚，自由写作。
long.en: AI-IME is a revolutionary Chrome extension that leverages AI to provide users with unparalleled input freedom. Upon activation, a webpage pops up, allowing users to input a mix of English and Pinyin in a freeform manner. The AI intelligently recognizes and corrects spelling and grammar, helping users of Chinese and other languages break free from the constraints of traditional IMEs and write freely.
